extDesc.message:
Wikipedia, Lyrics, Last.fm Scrobbling, Live Messenger "now playing", notifications.

Extend Deezer capabilities.

lastfmOptionHint.message: Deezer+ can update your Last.fm profile automatically based on the music you listen on Deezer. For this check the following box and connect to Last.fm.

wikipediaHint.message: If you want Wikipedia to appears in your language you must complete the following field, corresponding to your language code. You'll find it in the url of the Wikipedia's homepage.

wikipediaTry.message: To check the value you provided is correct, try to display this article:

wikipediaLicence.message: Wikipedia articles are distributed under the terms of the CC-BY-SA 3.0 Unported license and the GFDL license.

notificationsHint.message: Deezer+ can display a pop-up with the name of the song being played.

notificationsLicence.message: Last.fm will be used to retrieve album art displayed in the notifications for the music you have sent on Deezer.

mediakeysHint.message: Deezer+ allows you to control playback with multimedia keyboard buttons (Play, Pause, Next, etc.). when Chrome is the active application.

wlmHint.message: Enable the integration of Windows Live Messenger.

activateNowPlaying.message: Show what I listen on Messenger.

interfaceHint.message: Parts of the Deezer interface are useless and deserve to be banished from the screen.

activateInterfacesBlockTopBar.message: Top bar (The login, logout, counseling of the messages and subscription renewals can be made via the Pop-up or the options page)

interfaceHint2.message: You can also extend the player to fit your Chrome window

activateInterfacesSinglePlayer.message: Only allow a single instance of Deezer

optionsPlusHint.message: Don't forget to rate the extension on the Chrome Webstore!

optionsPlusHint2.message: Did you liked the extension? Make a donation!

paneCantBeLoaded.message: $ITEM$ can't be loaded as no Deezer tab is opened.

paneCantBeLoadedPlural.message: $ITEM$ can't be loaded as no Deezer tab is opened.

wikipediaPleaseStartPlaying.message: Start playing to display the Wikipedia article for this artist.

wikipediaCurrentlySearching.message: The Wikipedia article for $ARTIST$ is loading...

wikipediaCantBeFound.message: The Wikipedia article for $ARTIST$ couldn't be found.

lyricsPleaseStartPlaying.message: Start playing to display lyrics for this song.

lyricsCantBeFound.message: I can't find lyrics for this song.
